message: Let's start fair. I propose we split it 55/45.  I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, reflecting my higher loss in value per round. Let's be reasonable and come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Bob, but I'm not willing to accept a 60/40 split. Let's compromise and go for a 50/50 split.  This ensures both of us receive a fair share, despite the inflation.
